result.arabic_text: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غَيۡرِ ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
result.translation: the path of those whom You have blessed[6]; not of those who incurred Your Wrath[7], or of those who went astray[8].
result.footnotes:
[6] The way of the Prophets and those who follow them.
 [7] Those who know the Truth and do not follow it, like the Jews.
 [8] Those who are ignorant of the Truth and follow misguidance, like the Christians.
